name: Feed me (triggthediscovery)
description:
You found a fun plant buddy who came from space! Only problem is he like the taste of human flesh! Go find him some snacks so he can grow big and strong.
Explore an open world filled with 5 unique items and 4 unique hats, attempting to evade suspicion as you help your new friend grow.

Goal:

Feed people to your plant friend by throwing them at his mouth, and watch him grow. It can only end well.

Controls:

Arrow Keys/WASD - walk
Left Shift - attack
Left Control - pick up
Left Alt - throw
Space - cycle through inventory
Escape - exit (will exit immediately)
